Beg.Title: **Heeeyoo lets slow it down**
Beg.Description:
Stop begging so much, it makes you look like a little baby.
The Cooldown is 45 Seconds

Daily.Title: **You've already claimed your daily today**
Daily.Description: Please Come Back Tomorrow to Claim your Daily Rewards

Monthly.Description: Please Come Back Next Month to Claim your Monthly Rewards
